meta.description: Maximize the number of trucks dispatched from the warehouse in City 0 to the retail hub in City 5 per hour, without exceeding highway capacities.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities in the network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Transportation capacity of each highway between cities.

objective.name: max_trucks_to_hub
objective.description: Maximize the number of trucks dispatched from City 0 to City 5.

constraints.name: capacity_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for highway from City 0 to City 1.
